sections.heading: Particular legatee may demand security for delivery of legacy; administration in default of securityA particular legatee who has not received his legacy after being sent into possession by judgment may demand that the residuary legatee furnish security for the delivery of his legacy and may require
sections.text: Particular legatee may demand security for delivery of legacy; administration in default of securityA particular legatee who has not received his legacy after being sent into possession by judgment may demand that the residuary legatee furnish security for the delivery of his legacy and may require an administration of the succession in default of such security, as provided by Articles 3007 and 3008.
